email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Oceanic Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Would you be able to come down to the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concerns about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $48.50 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $48.50 is more in line with our expectations. However, could we push the laycan to 18-23 October? Also, can you confirm the vessel’s ETA at Houston? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve checked with the owner, and the laycan can be adjusted to 18-23 October. The vessel’s ETA at Houston is currently 17 October, so this should work well. Shall we proceed with the fixture at $48.50 per metric ton and $15,000 demurrage? Let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, that sounds good. Let’s proceed with the fixture at $48.50 per metric ton and $15,000 demurrage. Please send over the recap for review. Thanks for your help on this. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Fixture Recap - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, please find the fixture recap attached for your review. To summarize: Vessel: MV Oceanic Star, DWT: 150,000, LOA: 280m. Cargo: Crude Oil, 140,000 MT. Load Port: Houston. Discharge Port: Rotterdam. Laycan: 18-23 October. Freight: $48.50 per metric ton. Demurrage: $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if everything looks good. Best, Sarah
